attributes.action: re instate creative writing in SATs
attributes.additional_details:
It has come to our knowledge that creative writing has been excluded from S.A.T.S. We understand that our teachers will look through our creative writing pieces from previous years but we also know that there is not a S.A.T.S. paper for this subject which upsets us  (and many others) quite a bit. Also, many children in our school are considering a career as authors and we have made a lot of progress in our creative writing and know that many others have as well, but what is the use if there is not a paper for it
Yours sincerely,
Bluebelle Carroll, Ruby Fredericks, Dora Goudy, Ambrin Shafiq, Alice Perves from Eleanor Palmer School in Camden and on behalf of all the children across the land.
